groups.title: Avam Sciences
groups.body: Avam Sciences advances molecular and microbiology technologies, providing high-quality reagents, consumables, and instruments for research, healthcare, and industry.

groups.title: InMicro Laboratories
groups.body: InMicro specializes in microbiology, offering prepared and dehydrated media, along with essential lab consumables for microbial testing and quality control.

groups.title: Ecose Labs
groups.body: Ecose focuses on cell culture, delivering optimized media, sera, and consumables for research, bioprocessing, and therapeutic development.
